ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] SoL (was some random digest number)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... or ... and ... Norrath... Actually, some of the interviews have specifically mentioned that they re re-doing the pcs to take advantage of the graphics
ygData.messageBody:
> I also don't think that the current player models will be any different
or
> better than what they are now, unless you count new armor (which would
> really only be a new skin, not a new model). If you remember Velious
and
> even Kunark have NPC's that are much more detailed than old world
Norrath...

Actually, some of the interviews have specifically mentioned that they're
re-doing the pcs to take advantage of the graphics upgrade...

"JB: I personally can't wait to see all the new player-character models
and textures and the attachable armor that they will be able to wear.
Visually, Luclin should raise the bar higher than either of the first two
expansions did"

(from the gamespot article at
http://gamespot.com/gamespot/stories/previews/0,10869,2709511,00.html)

-Karisma Swiftarrow
www.freespeech.org/karisma/
